intro: Lotononis bracteata, commonly known as the African violet, is a flowering plant native to southern Africa. It is characterized by its dense, velvety foliage and clusters of showy, violet-colored flowers. The plant typically grows in rocky or sandy soils and thrives in well-drained conditions.
